turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm trying to order a pizza from Pizza hut.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I can help with that! Which location are you trying to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Cliff road store

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The one in Eagan?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I have the store set to the Eagan, Cliff Road location. Will this be for carry out or delivery?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: This will be for carry out.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like to hear about any specials?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The pizza specials include a $7.99 Large 2 topping pizza or $5 pizzas when you order two or more (medium only)

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Lets to the $5 deal

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The $5 deal also includes wings, pasta, breadsticks, or garlic knots for $5 a piece. Would you like to add any of those to your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Lets do the Garlic knots.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Those have been added. What kind of crust would you like for your first pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will have stuffed crust for both.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: These pizzas are only 1 topping, it may be additional charges for extra. What would you like for your topping?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Lets do Pepperoni for the first pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The first pizza is stuffed crust with Pepperoni. What topping would you like on the second pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Lets do sausage for the second pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Excellent, I have a stuffed crust pepperoni pizza and a stuffed crust sausage pizza. We also have a side of garlic knots. Would you like anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I dont think so, that food should last a while.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The receipt has been sent to your phone. The pizzas should be ready for pickup in about 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You are welcome, goodbye.
